function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Risks associated with international attention on epidemic analysis, policy measures, and global development based on responses in china.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global crises triggered by covid-19","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"National considerations and geopolitical interests may prioritize big nations over international collaboration during global crises.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hoarding of vaccines","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in risk communication across states leading to different risk perceptions","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Slow pace of action and failure to ban travel from high-risk countries","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Porous borders contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Politically-driven variability in covid-19 restrictions across municipalities in the state leads to inconsistent enforcement of guidelines, affecting disease control measures in parks.","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for political and societal factors in misinformation research","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to accurately determine the reliability of news sources.","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to shape future outcomes through present actions","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographical diversities and political responses within countries may impact the adoption of sustainable energy transitions, potentially influencing disease prevention efforts.","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shift in political focus from short-term gains to long-term resilience measures","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changing social and political practices affecting sustainable transitions","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of increased decentralization of energy governance from multilateral to national, transnational, and local scales due to the frailty of global decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backtracking of major players on national level commitments","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordinated and inclusive global energy governance","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Policy responses to the covid-19 pandemic influencing the pace of sustainable energy transitions.","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate urban planning
